ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you sure it wasn t the Stiletto of the Bloodclaw she was selling? Those often go for 200 plat. At the CZ Bazaar last night, Dirks were regularly going for
ygData.messageBody:
Are you sure it wasn't the Stiletto of the Bloodclaw she was selling? Those
often go for 200 plat. At the CZ Bazaar last night, Dirks were regularly
going for 50-60 plat. Even though it is a regular spawn in CB the one thing
you have to deal with that makes it 'rare' is waiting in line to pop Dvinn I
would guess.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: BrainBoss@... [mailto:BrainBoss@...]
8)Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 12:46 PM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
8)
8)
8)From: BrainBoss@...
8)
8)In a message dated 6/16/99 9:14:53 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
8)kim@... writes:
8)
8)<< I've seen it advertised from as low as 10pp to 100pp. The big
8) difference between the dirk and other special weapons is that
8) the mob who carries it spawns often, and has it every time.
8) It is going to cause a serious realignment of prices for
8) weapons in the L15-25 range. I personally wouldn't pay more
8) than about 15pp for one, maybe 20pp if I were in Qeynos >>
8)
8)
8) Heh... I was in West Commonlands yesterday and someone
8)was selling the
8)dirk. She wanted me to make the first bid and laughed at 50
8)plat. She said
8)the lowest she would go would be 120 plat. In fact, a
8)guildmate said he's
8)seen them go for over 300 plat... I guess I'll pick one up
8)when I'm in
8)Faydwer next time.
8)
8)
8)Amhran Fasach, gypsy bard of the Soerbaird
8)Fennin Ro
8)
